definition: to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]

sentences.english: Guangzhou business streets with protruding buildings are of the most charming urban space.
sentences.chinese: 广州骑楼商业街是最有魅力的城市空间。

sentences.english: Continuing Qi-lou has meaning of both substance and culture.
sentences.chinese: 延续骑楼具有实体与文化上的双重意义。

sentences.english: Haikou arcaded streets, including water alley.
sentences.chinese: 海口骑楼老街包括水巷口。

definition: Lao Cai, Vietnam/Laokai or Laukkai, Burma (Myanmar)
"shikumen" style architecture: traditional (ca. 19th century) residences with courtyards, once common in Shanghai
tenement building, typically of 2-4 stories, with a shop on the ground floor and upper floors used for residential purposes (esp. in southern China)
triforium (gallery of arches above side-aisle vaulting in the nave of a church)
road or pavement laid with flagstones
